    public class Hero
extends java.lang.Object

    Class that contains all information regarding the hero

    1.0
    Author:
    José Borges and Miguel Mano Fernandes
    See Also:

        Moves the hero up
        Parameters:
        map - map where the hero is currently at
        Returns:
        Returns a value based on whether the move was successfull or not or if it was a game winner or a door opener

      • moveHero

        public int moveHero(GameMap map,
                    java.lang.String move)
        Moves the hero
        Parameters:
        map - map where the hero is currently placed
        move - String that determines whether the hero goes up, down, left or right
        Returns:
        Returns a value based on whether the move was successfull or not or if it was a game winner or a door opener

        Returns:
